location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Jonathan Duncan, President and Governor in Council, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing a copy of a communication (not present) from Sir Harford Jones [Brydges] and William Bruce's reply (see f. 19-19v). The subject of the exchange being the destruction of the old factory at Bushire. The letter further notes that William Bruce is still living in tents, as work on his replacement accommodation has not yet begun.
